Title: Prohibits the use of primates in entertainment acts
Summary: Prohibits the use of primates in entertainment acts; prohibits the department of environmental conservation for issuing any license or permit that would authorize the use of a primate in an entertainment act.
LawCode: Add ยง380-a, Ag & Mkts L; add ยง11-0540-a, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the use of primates in entertainment acts
